body: Honestly this artist has gotten so lazy in how they draw doujins now, no backgrounds and Gudao looks like an unpainted figurine, compare this to their first stuff which while in black and white clear had more effort put into it.
Great work, I love salter, I wish her skin is pale though.

Sorry about the long rants I am tired and just a bit passionate about this.
On the other hand I don't want to say there is not original art here however I would find it fun to see how many more cases of coping have been used in this dojinshi

I don't doubt that yd also uses reference pictures aswell however the shading this artist uses in some images is nearly identical to yd.
Artists regularly use reference to draw inspirations from nature , the internet and artists .however in this case in my opinion since I believe stolen art is being used as the cover all just for a quick buck or some followers .you can disagree with me but I find i don't mind using references in practice however in this case it doesn't make sense to use such a pixel perfect image as the cover I just find it a but gross and scummy

I believe this artist may I dare say plagiarised other artist .I can recognise the cover\pg12 to be yds yang guifei from 368845 and pg 8 to be a mirrored version of mhx again from yd 276730.

For me, the art feels inconsistent , the head to body and waist ratios seem to change frequently .i believe this is due to the repeated use of vastly different reference pictures sourced from other doujinshi's.from what i can tell where the "artist"has edited (maybe to avoid being caught )pictures resulting in details like the legs loseng details compared to the chest and waist areas .
I may be wrong but this looks very similar to this 368845 yd
Gonna put this in my favorites until a translation comes out. There's just something about seeing Saber Alter, in particular, fully nude that flips my switch. So this book is a real treat to look at.
